WorkItem.Description:
The NuGet package MvvmLightLibs 4.4.32.1 contains folders for each .NET version.
The GalaSoft.MvvmLight.dll version for 3.5 and 4.0 is 4.4.32.18939. However the version for .NET 4.5 is 4.4.32.39728. This creates compilation problems for 4.5 projects which reference 4.0 projects, as described [here](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/24360012/using-net-4-0-library-with-other-dependencies-from-a-net-4-5-1-project).
